name: Java 7 Porter Stemmer
tagline: Porter Stemmer in Java optimized for Java 1.7
body:
### Welcome to Java 7 Porter Stemmer
The Porter stemmer is widely known and used, but it crashes in Java 7. This project makes smaller modifications that allow it to work in Java 7. To easily download it, you can go to [https://github.com/bean5/Java-Porter-Stemmer/zipball/master](https://github.com/bean5/Java-Porter-Stemmer/zipball/master).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Gt some some ideas for the project? Just leave feedback at [https://github.com/bean5/Java-Porter-Stemmer/issues/new](https://github.com/bean5/Java-Porter-Stemmer/issues/new)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
